Class Mail

public class Mail
extends java.lang.Object

The contents of a mail and basic headers (from, to, subject).

Constructor Detail

Mail

public Mail(java.lang.String from,
            java.util.List<Recipient> to,
            java.lang.String subject,
            Mail.Body body)
Parameters:
from - The e-mail address which will be the value of the From: header in the mail. Can be of the format "john@doe.com" or "John Doe <john@doe.com>".
to - The list of Recipient which will appear in the To: header in the mail.
subject - The subject of the mail.
body - The body of the mail.
